iOS editing

Make a list here of iOS apps I have tried.

Working Copy & Editorial

Working Copy and Editorial are what works. The workflow for Working Copy must first be installed in Editorial. Then, sending a file to Editorial from the action menu in WC, opens it there to be edited. The tool (wrench icon) menu in E has the WC workflow which saves to WC seamlessly. WC automatically opens a commit sheet for the edited file. Once the mandatory comment is written, the Commit+Push button activates and can be touched. A message bar appears confirming the commit.
